name: Poofers the Dog
text: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Poofers" card from your Deck to your hand. (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY; shuffle 1 "Poofers" monster you control into the Deck, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Poofers" monster with a different name from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Poofers the Dog" once per turn.
